faq.title: Campus ET36 - Help Section
faq.heading: Help Section - Frequently Asked Questions
faq.section1.title: üß© General Use of the System
faq.section1.a1: Enter your username and password on the homepage. If you don‚Äôt have an account, please register first.
faq.section1.q2: What should I do if I forgot my password?
faq.section1.a2: Use the "Forgot password" link on the login page and follow the steps. If the problem persists, contact support.
faq.section1.q3: What roles exist and what can each do?
faq.section1.a3: Roles include: student, teacher, executive (directivo) and site administrator. Each role has specific permissions; for example students can upload assignments, teachers can create announcements, etc.
faq.section1.q4: How do I update my personal data?
faq.section1.a4: Go to your profile from the top menu, edit the fields and save the changes.
faq.section2.title: üìù Announcements
faq.section2.a1: Go to the "Announcements" section from the main menu. Announcements are shown according to your role and course.
faq.section3.title: üóÇÔ∏è File Uploads / Submissions (student role)
faq.section3.q1: How do I upload my work?
faq.section3.a1: Go to the corresponding class page and use the "Submit" or "Upload file" form. Attach the file and confirm submission.
faq.section3.a2: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX, ZIP, PNG, JPG and JPEG (file size limit typically 10 MB).
faq.section3.q3: Can I delete or replace a file?
faq.section3.a3: No ‚Äî deletions or manual edits in the database are not available via the public UI. If you need to replace a file, contact the teacher or admin.
faq.section4.title: üìö Administration (teachers / admins)
faq.section4.q1: How do I create a new user?
faq.section4.a1: Go to the "Users" section (for roles with permissions), click "Create new user", fill required fields and save.
faq.section4.q2: How do I send an announcement to a course?
faq.section4.a2: Go to "Announcements", choose "New announcement", fill title, content and recipient (role or course), then send.
faq.section4.q3: What is the activity log (bit√°cora) and how does it work?
faq.section4.a3: The activity log records important user actions (account creation, posting announcements, file uploads, etc.). It does not register manual deletions made directly in the database.
faq.section5.title: üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting
faq.section5.text: If you encounter issues not listed here, contact soporteet36@gmail.com or get in touch with a school executive.
